title: FPS Dropping Issue
body: Hello, I am new to the LOL world. I recently bought my first gaming laptop and I am very excited to be finally playing LOL. My issue is that when I have the game in fullscreen or borderless mode, my FPS drop from my capped 120 FPS to 30 FPS every 30-45 seconds. It does this cycle repetitively throughout the match. However, when I run it in windowed mode, I have no problems what so ever. Its kind of annoying to tun in windows mode though. My drivers are all up to date. My computer has a GTX 1080 gpu, 32GB of ram, and is running the I7-6700. Any ideas why this is is happening? Thanks

replies.body: You may need to update your graphics drivers to support your screen setup, but there could be other factors impeding your fps.  I suggest using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, and going through each step to tune up your PC.  Let me know if you have any questions!
